title: Right to Safety
desc: Consumers have the right to be protected against hazardous products.

title: Right to be Informed
desc: Consumers have the right to be informed about the goods and services they purchase.

title: Right to Choose
desc: Consumers have the right to choose from a variety of goods and services.
shortDesc: Choose freely from a variety of goods.

title: Right to be Heard
desc: Consumers have the right to have their interests considered in appropriate forums.

title: Right to Seek Redressal
desc: Consumers have the right to seek redressal against unfair practices.

title: Right to Consumer Education
desc: Consumers have the right to be educated about their consumer rights.
